crypto_exchange|users|USERSTAMP: TEXT. Unique user identifier. PK. Example: U583322.
crypto_exchange|users|acctScope: TEXT. Scope or permission tier of the user account. **NULL means account scope not specified.**. Possible values: Futures, Margin, Options, Spot.
crypto_exchange|orders|ORD_STAMP: TEXT. Unique order identifier. PK. Example: OR6015391.
crypto_exchange|orders|TimeCode: TIMESTAMP. Timestamp when the order was submitted. Possible values: 2025/2/19. Possible values: 2025/2/19.
crypto_exchange|orders|exchSpot: TEXT. Exchange trading pair or market symbol. Example: EX203.
crypto_exchange|orders|market_note: TEXT. Descriptive note about the market context. Example: ETH-USDT.
crypto_exchange|orders|UserRef: TEXT. User identifier who placed the order. FK to users.
crypto_exchange|orders|UPDATED_AT: TIMESTAMP. Last update timestamp for the order record. Possible values: 2025/2/19 08:29.
crypto_exchange|orderExecutions|RecordVa: TEXT. Unique execution record identifier. PK. Example: OB333576. Example: OB333576.
crypto_exchange|orderExecutions|remain_a: REAL. Remaining order amount. **NULL means remaining amount not recorded.**. Example: 0.545024.
crypto_exchange|orderExecutions|expireSp: TIMESTAMP. Expiration timestamp for the execution record. Example: 02/22/2025 08:29.
crypto_exchange|orderExecutions|CancelNo: TEXT. Cancellation reason or note. **NULL means no cancellation note.**. Possible values: Expired, InsufficientFunds, UserRequested. Possible values: Expired, InsufficientFunds, UserRequested.
crypto_exchange|orderExecutions|EXECtune: TEXT. Execution tuning parameter. **NULL means execution tune not specified.**. Possible values: Maker, Taker.
crypto_exchange|orderExecutions|Ord_Link: TEXT. Identifier of the parent order. FK to orders.
crypto_exchange|fees|fee_range: TEXT. Fee-tier or range descriptor. **NULL means fee range not provided.**. Possible values: Tier1, Tier2, Tier3, Tier4.
crypto_exchange|fees|FeeRate: REAL. Applied fee rate (e.g., 0.001 = 0.1 %). Example: 0.0007. Example: 0.0007. Example: 0.0007.
crypto_exchange|fees|FEE_TOTAL: TEXT. Total fee amount as text. Example: $26.60 .
crypto_exchange|fees|FeeCoin: TEXT. Currency in which the fee is charged. **NULL means fee currency not specified.**. Possible values: USD, USDC, USDT. Possible values: USD, USDC, USDT.
crypto_exchange|fees|rebRate: TEXT. Rebate rate if applicable. Example: 0.09%.
crypto_exchange|fees|Order_Link: TEXT. Related order identifier. FK to orders.
crypto_exchange|marketdata|EXCH_SPOT: TEXT. Exchange spot market symbol. PK.
crypto_exchange|marketdata|TimeTrack: TIMESTAMP. Timestamp when the snapshot was taken.
crypto_exchange|marketdata|mktCombo: TEXT. Market combination or instrument group.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|fundRate: REAL. Funding rate applicable to perpetual swaps. Example: 0.0004.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|openStake: REAL. Open interest or stake. Example: 808922.74.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|VOLday: REAL. Trading volume of the day. Example: 3045613.27.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|TRADE_DAY: BIGINT. Trading-day counter. **NULL means trade-day not recorded.**. Example: 73628.0.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|turnoverDay: REAL. Turnover for the day. Example: 9406054.28.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|priceShiftDa: TEXT. Price shift over the day. **NULL means price shift not recorded.**. Example: 7.96%.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|VwapDay: REAL. Volume-weighted average price of the day. Example: 26269.45. Example: 26269.45.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|TOTAL_SUPPLY: REAL. Total supply figure. **NULL means total supply not available.**. Example: 96226091.91.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|MAXsupPLY: TEXT. Maximum supply cap. Example: 188,391,541 tokens.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|MktHold: REAL. Market value held by top addresses. Example: 0.026. Example: 0.026.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|tradeRank: BIGINT. Trading-volume rank across markets. Example: 52.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|vol_meter: TEXT. Volume-intensity meter reading. **NULL means volume meter not set.**. Example: 55.65.
crypto_exchange|marketstats|md_link: TEXT. Reference to the underlying market data. FK to marketdata.
crypto_exchange|analyticsindicators|ANAL: BIGSERIAL. Unique analytics indicator identifier. PK.
crypto_exchange|analyticsindicators|md_r: TEXT. Reference to market data snapshot. FK to marketdata.
crypto_exchange|riskandmargin|MARG_FORM: TEXT. Unique margin-form identifier. PK. Possible values: Cross, Isolated.
crypto_exchange|riskandmargin|ordStamp: TEXT. Associated order identifier. FK to orders.
crypto_exchange|accountbalances|ACCTBAL_: BIGSERIAL. Unique account-balance record identifier. PK.
crypto_exchange|accountbalances|walletSu: TEXT. Total wallet balance as text. Example: $316,482.99 .
crypto_exchange|accountbalances|userTAG: TEXT. User identifier for the balance. FK to users.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|SYS_MON: BIGSERIAL. Unique system-monitoring record identifier. PK.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|APIRQTo: BIGINT. Total API requests processed. **NULL means API request total not recorded.**. Example: 7728.0.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|apiErrT: BIGINT. Total API error count. Example: 4.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|ApiLatM: REAL. API latency marker in milliseconds. **NULL means latency not measured.**. Example: 547.0.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|WS_STAT: TEXT. WebSocket subsystem state. Possible values: Connected, Disconnected.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|RateRem: BIGINT. Remaining rate-limit quota. Example: 939. Example: 939.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|lastUpd: TEXT. Notes for the last system update. Example: 9340653.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|SeqCode: TEXT. Sequence code for deployments. **NULL means sequence code not set.**. Example: 6559236.0. Example: 6559236.0.
crypto_exchange|systemmonitoring|ExecTim: REAL. Execution time span metric. **NULL means execution time span not captured.**. Example: 203.0. Example: 203.0.
crypto_exchange|Exchange_OrderType_Map|e: TEXT. Exchange market symbol. PK. Example: EX203.

crypto_exchange|orders|order_attributes.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates the core descriptive parameters of an order (type, side, price, size, status, etc.) into one JSONB field for simpler retrieval and analytics.

fields_meaning.type: TEXT. Order-type or tuning parameter. Possible values: Limit, Market, Stop, StopLimit.
fields_meaning.side: TEXT. Deal-edge or strategy tag. Possible values: Buy, Sell.
fields_meaning.limit_price: REAL. Executed deal price quote. Example: 27080.39.
fields_meaning.quantity: REAL. Quantity executed in base units. Example: 1.992955. Example: 1.992955.
fields_meaning.notional_value: TEXT. Notional trade value. **NULL means notional value not recorded.**. Example: $81,019.90 .
fields_meaning.status: TEXT. Order-flow direction or category. Possible values: Cancelled, Filled, New, PartiallyFilled.
fields_meaning.time_in_force: TEXT. Intended order lifespan or validity period. **NULL means lifespan not specified.**. Possible values: FOK, GTC, GTD, IOC.
fields_meaning.source: TEXT. Base currency origin or funding source. Possible values: API, Bot, Mobile, Web.
fields_meaning.client_order_id: TEXT. Client-side marker or reference label. Example: CL5311016.

crypto_exchange|marketdata|orderbook_met.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures the complete snapshot of best bid/ask quotes, depths, spreads and reference prices in a single JSONB column for fast order-book analytics.

fields_meaning.best_bid: REAL. Best bid price quote. Example: 27069.78.
fields_meaning.best_ask: REAL. Best ask price quote. Example: 27102.24.
fields_meaning.bid_size: REAL. Bid depth volume in units. Example: 64.091241.
fields_meaning.ask_size: REAL. Ask depth volume in units. Example: 87.620549.
fields_meaning.spread_pct: TEXT. Relative spread rate. **NULL means spread rate not calculated.**. Example: 11.99%.

crypto_exchange|analyticsindicators|indi.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups together real-time technical, order-flow and sentiment indicators so that trading models can access a single JSONB payload instead of many separate columns.

order_flow.buy_wall_pct: REAL. Buy wall band measurement. Example: 0.017.
order_flow.sell_wall_pct: REAL. Sell wall band measurement. Example: 0.0891.
order_flow.buy_pressure: REAL. Aggregate buy-side force. Example: 0.926. Example: 0.926.
order_flow.trade_flow_imbalance: REAL. Trade imbalance indicator. **NULL means trade imbalance not computed.**. Example: 0.102. Example: 0.102.
order_flow.large_order_ratio: REAL. Rate of large-size trades. Example: 0.683. Example: 0.683.

sentiment.market_sentiment: TEXT. Market sentiment descriptor. Possible values: Bearish, Bullish, Neutral.
sentiment.signal: TEXT. Technical meter indicator. Possible values: Buy, Hold, Sell. Possible values: Buy, Hold, Sell.

participant_flow.retail_flow: REAL. Retail-flow share. **NULL means retail flow not measured.**. Example: -0.893.
participant_flow.whale_activity: TEXT. Whale-wallet activity descriptor. **NULL means whale motion not assessed.**. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.
participant_flow.market_maker_note: TEXT. Maker-order flow descriptor. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.

cross_venue.cross_exchange_spread_pct: REAL. Cross-exchange band width. **NULL means band not computed.**. Example: 0.0077.
cross_venue.funding_gap_pct: REAL. Funding-rate gap across exchanges. Example: 0.0011.
cross_venue.basis_gap_pct: REAL. Basis gap between spot and futures. Example: 0.0009.

crypto_exchange|riskandmargin|margin_ris.column_meaning: JSONB column. Consolidates leverage, margin requirements, liquidation levels and qualitative risk flags into one JSONB column for quicker position-risk assessment and auditing.

fields_meaning.leverage: TEXT. Leverage scale descriptor. Possible values: 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100. Possible values: 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100.
fields_meaning.maintenance_margin_pct: REAL. Maintenance margin requirement. Example: 5397.0. Example: 5397.0.
fields_meaning.liquidation_price: TEXT. Liquidation price quote. **NULL means liquidation quote not set.**. Example: $28,043.66 .
fields_meaning.stop_trigger_price: REAL. Trigger price quote. Example: 29018.82. Example: 29018.82.
fields_meaning.trailing_delta: REAL. Trailing difference for stop orders. Example: 0.029.
fields_meaning.position_side: TEXT. Position edge strategy. **NULL means position edge not defined.**. Possible values: Long, Short.
fields_meaning.leverage_multiplier: TEXT. Position magnitude description. Possible values: 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100. Possible values: 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100.
fields_meaning.margin_ratio_pct: TEXT. Margin rate tier. **NULL means margin rate not specified.**. Example: 65.90%.
fields_meaning.bankruptcy_price: REAL. Break-point quote for liquidation. **NULL means break-point quote not set.**. Example: 20254.06.
fields_meaning.collateral_ratio_pct: TEXT. Collateral rate. **NULL means collateral rate not specified.**. Example: 48.00%.
fields_meaning.collateral_amount: TEXT. Collateral sum amount. Example: 750,485.81 USDT.
fields_meaning.collateral_currency: TEXT. Coin used as collateral. **NULL means collateral coin not specified.**. Possible values: BTC, ETH, USDC, USDT.
